person.description:
Loves to work with everything related to the web, Salim has a long time development experience using different platforms for the web: Flash, PHP, HTML5, CSS. Executing a project that looks actually like the graphic designer intended it to be is one of his strong points.
Aside from doing a Web Science masters in Cologne University of Applied Sciences, his current mission is to become a rails guru.
person.meta_title: Salim Hbeiliny - Ruby on Rails developer in the making
